requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a ClassLoaderFactory to create instances of xmlBlaster specific classloaders.

description.p: The ClassLoaderFactory creates instances of XmlBlasterClassLoader or PluginClassLoader on demand.
One and only one ClassLoaderFactory instance will be created per Global instance.
The created ClassLoaders are derivations of URLClassLoader.
